It’s a little scary! .Will be released on the KSP forums soon. #KSP<br/><br/></p>

Wow. I have no idea how to make that. Especially the large rotating hubs. If only the game's physics was fast enough to render that in 30 fps, it might be possible to figure it out from watching the video.
You can download it from the spacecraft exchange area, heaps of cool stuff there

What sorcery is this?!?

Unity physics.

Watch the video at 2x normal rate. It's what it would look like if KSP could render it at 30 fps.

Very cool...

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

Oh... My God... It's been done... It's finally been done!! Three years in the making we have been waiting to see a stock walker and it finally has been done... beautiful.

- Literally with no joking around the moment the thing started moving to the very end I had one gigantic grin on my face. We need more engineers like this! Insta-sub!

Edited October 29, 2015 by Avera9eJoe

So I guess this means the wheels as roller bearings trick works again... I had thought one of the versions in the past year borked it.

Either I was misinformed, or it got fixed at some point.

Kewl!

Something about the Giant Steam Clouds and air intake "devil horns"makes this terrifying...

also its gargantuan size and many-jointed legs make my worst mech-mares pale.

If this was implemented in a horror game, they wouldn't have to change it at all. It would be epic!
